meanings.meaning: Have a harmonious or friendly relationship.
meanings.example: They seem to get along well with each other.
meanings.translation: Eles parecem se dar bem um com o outro.

meanings.meaning: Make progress or move forward.
meanings.example: The project is getting along smoothly.
meanings.translation: O projeto está progredindo sem problemas.

meanings.meaning: Refuse or reject something.
meanings.example: She had to turn down the job offer.
meanings.translation: Ela teve que recusar a oferta de emprego.

meanings.meaning: Decrease the volume or intensity.
meanings.example: Can you turn down the music?
meanings.translation: Você pode abaixar o volume da música?

meanings.meaning: Remove or unfasten something.
meanings.example: Please take off your shoes before entering the house.
meanings.translation: Por favor, tire os sapatos antes de entrar na casa.

meanings.meaning: Leave the ground, especially in an aircraft.
meanings.example: The plane will take off in 20 minutes.
meanings.translation: O avião vai decolar em 20 minutos.

meanings.meaning: Stop doing or trying something.
meanings.example: I won't give up until I succeed.
meanings.translation: Não vou desistir até conseguir.

meanings.meaning: Surrender or abandon something.
meanings.example: He had to give up his dream of becoming an astronaut.
meanings.translation: Ele teve que abandonar o sonho de se tornar astronauta.

meanings.meaning: Search for information or a word in a reference source.
meanings.example: If you don't know the meaning, you can look it up in the dictionary.
meanings.translation: Se você não sabe o significado, você pode procurá-lo no dicionário.

meanings.meaning: Improve or become better.
meanings.example: Things are starting to look up for the company.
meanings.translation: As coisas estão começando a melhorar para a empresa.

meanings.meaning: Use all of something and have none left.
meanings.example: We've run out of milk. I need to buy some.
meanings.translation: Acabamos com o leite. Preciso comprar mais.

meanings.meaning: Exhaust the supply of something.
meanings.example: The store has run out of the new video game.
meanings.translation: A loja esgotou o estoque do novo jogo de vídeo.

meanings.meaning: Find or discover something by chance.
meanings.example: I came across an old photo album while cleaning the attic.
meanings.translation: Encontrei um álbum de fotos antigo enquanto limpava o sótão.

meanings.meaning: Appear in a certain way to others.
meanings.example: He comes across as a very confident person.
meanings.translation: Ele passa a impressão de ser uma pessoa muito confiante.

meanings.meaning: Take care of or be responsible for someone or something.
meanings.example: She looks after her younger siblings when her parents are at work.
meanings.translation: Ela cuida dos irmãos mais novos quando os pais estão no trabalho.

meanings.meaning: Pay attention to or watch over someone or something.
meanings.example: Could you look after my bag while I use the restroom?
meanings.translation: Você poderia cuidar da minha bolsa enquanto eu uso o banheiro?

meanings.meaning: Wait or pause.
meanings.example: Please hold on for a moment while I check your reservation.
meanings.translation: Por favor, aguarde um momento enquanto verifico a sua reserva.

meanings.meaning: Grasp something tightly.
meanings.example: Hold on to the railing while going down the stairs.
meanings.translation: Segure-se na grade ao descer as escadas.

meanings.meaning: Arrive or appear unexpectedly.
meanings.example: He turned up at the party without any prior notice.
meanings.translation: Ele apareceu na festa sem aviso prévio.

meanings.meaning: Increase the volume or intensity.
meanings.example: Can you turn up the radio a bit?
meanings.translation: Você pode aumentar um pouco o volume do rádio?

meanings.meaning: Fail to function or stop working.
meanings.example: My car broke down on the way to work.
meanings.translation: Meu carro quebrou no caminho para o trabalho.

meanings.meaning: Lose control of one's emotions.
meanings.example: She broke down and cried when she heard the news.
meanings.translation: Ela desabou e chorou quando ouviu a notícia.

meanings.meaning: Continue or proceed.
meanings.example: Please go on with your presentation.
meanings.translation: Por favor, continue com a sua apresentação.

meanings.meaning: Happen or occur.
meanings.example: What's going on in the next room?
meanings.translation: O que está acontecendo na próxima sala?

meanings.meaning: Arrange or establish something.
meanings.example: They set up a new company together.
meanings.translation: Eles fundaram uma nova empresa juntos.

meanings.meaning: Prepare or assemble something for use.
meanings.example: Can you help me set up the barbecue grill?
meanings.translation: Você pode me ajudar a montar a churrasqueira?

meanings.meaning: Recover from an illness or a setback.
meanings.example: It took her a while to get over the flu.
meanings.translation: Levou um tempo para ela se recuperar da gripe.

meanings.meaning: Overcome a difficulty or emotional challenge.
meanings.example: He's trying to get over the loss of his pet.
meanings.translation: Ele está tentando superar a perda do seu animal de estimação.

meanings.meaning: Cancel an event or activity.
meanings.example: They had to call off the picnic due to bad weather.
meanings.translation: Eles tiveram que cancelar o piquenique devido ao mau tempo.

meanings.meaning: Order a person or animal to stop attacking or chasing.
meanings.example: She called off the dog when she saw her friend.
meanings.translation: Ela mandou o cachorro parar quando viu a amiga.

meanings.meaning: Raise a child; care for and educate.
meanings.example: She was brought up by her grandparents.
meanings.translation: Ela foi criada pelos avós.

meanings.meaning: Mention a topic in conversation.
meanings.example: He brought up the issue during the meeting.
meanings.translation: Ele mencionou o assunto durante a reunião.

meanings.meaning: Arrive or appear, especially unexpectedly.
meanings.example: He didn't show up at the party as he promised.
meanings.translation: Ele não apareceu na festa como prometeu.

meanings.meaning: Be visible or noticeable.
meanings.example: Stains on the white shirt really show up.
meanings.translation: Manchas na camisa branca realmente aparecem.

meanings.meaning: Resemble or have similar traits to a family member.
meanings.example: She takes after her mother in terms of appearance.
meanings.translation: Ela se parece com a mãe em termos de aparência.

meanings.meaning: Follow someone's example or pattern of behavior.
meanings.example: He takes after his father in his work ethic.
meanings.translation: Ele segue o exemplo do pai em sua ética de trabalho.

meanings.meaning: Cause something to happen or come into existence.
meanings.example: New technology brought about significant changes in the industry.
meanings.translation: Nova tecnologia trouxe mudanças significativas na indústria.

meanings.meaning: Make something occur as a result of one's actions.
meanings.example: Their hard work brought about positive results.
meanings.translation: O trabalho duro deles trouxe resultados positivos.

meanings.meaning: End a romantic relationship.
meanings.example: They decided to break up after many disagreements.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram terminar o relacionamento após muitas discussões.

meanings.meaning: Separate into smaller pieces.
meanings.example: He broke up the chocolate bar to share with friends.
meanings.translation: Ele quebrou a barra de chocolate para compartilhar com os amigos.

meanings.meaning: Establish a stable and permanent home.
meanings.example: After traveling for years, he finally decided to settle down.
meanings.translation: Depois de viajar por anos, ele finalmente decidiu se estabelecer.

meanings.meaning: Become calm and comfortable after a period of excitement or change.
meanings.example: She's looking forward to settling down after a busy week.
meanings.translation: Ela está ansiosa para se acalmar depois de uma semana agitada.

meanings.meaning: Delay or hinder progress.
meanings.example: The traffic accident held up the morning commute.
meanings.translation: O acidente de trânsito atrasou a viagem matinal.

meanings.meaning: Support or lift something up.
meanings.example: Please hold up the sign so everyone can see.
meanings.translation: Por favor, segure a placa para que todos possam ver.

meanings.meaning: Be vigilant or watchful.
meanings.example: Look out for pedestrians while driving through the city.
meanings.translation: Fique atento a pedestres ao dirigir pela cidade.

meanings.meaning: Be aware of potential dangers or hazards.
meanings.example: Look out for icy patches on the road.
meanings.translation: Fique atento a áreas de gelo na estrada.

meanings.meaning: Encounter someone unexpectedly.
meanings.example: I ran into my old friend at the supermarket.
meanings.translation: Encontrei meu antigo amigo no supermercado.

meanings.meaning: Collide with something or someone accidentally.
meanings.example: She ran into the door while looking at her phone.
meanings.translation: Ela bateu na porta enquanto olhava para o celular.

meanings.meaning: Anticipate something with pleasure.
meanings.example: I look forward to seeing you at the party.
meanings.translation: Estou ansioso para te ver na festa.

meanings.meaning: Eagerly await a future event or experience.
meanings.example: She looks forward to her vacation every year.
meanings.translation: Ela aguarda ansiosamente suas férias todos os anos.

meanings.meaning: Use up all of something and have none left.
meanings.example: We've run out of coffee. I need to buy more.
meanings.translation: Acabamos com o café. Preciso comprar mais.

meanings.meaning: Exhaust the supply of something.
meanings.example: The store has run out of the popular toy.
meanings.translation: A loja esgotou o estoque do brinquedo popular.

meanings.meaning: Postpone or delay an event or action.
meanings.example: They decided to put off the meeting until next week.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram adiar a reunião para a próxima semana.

meanings.meaning: Cause someone to lose interest or enthusiasm.
meanings.example: The bad weather put off many potential visitors.
meanings.translation: O mau tempo desanimou muitos visitantes em potencial.

meanings.meaning: Survive or manage with limited resources.
meanings.example: With the salary cut, it's hard to get by.
meanings.translation: Com o corte de salário, é difícil se virar.

meanings.meaning: Cope or handle a situation adequately.
meanings.example: She can get by even in challenging circumstances.
meanings.translation: Ela consegue se virar mesmo em circunstâncias difíceis.

meanings.meaning: Admire or respect someone.
meanings.example: I've always looked up to my older brother.
meanings.translation: Eu sempre admirei meu irmão mais velho.

meanings.meaning: Hold someone in high regard or consider them a role model.
meanings.example: Many people look up to her for her achievements.
meanings.translation: Muitas pessoas a admiram por suas conquistas.

meanings.meaning: Surrender or yield to someone or something.
meanings.example: After a long debate, they finally gave in to his demands.
meanings.translation: Após um longo debate, eles finalmente cederam às exigências dele.

meanings.meaning: Relent or agree to something unwillingly.
meanings.example: She gave in to her friend's constant persuasions.
meanings.translation: Ela cedeu às constantes persuasões do amigo.

meanings.meaning: Introduce or present something new or different.
meanings.example: The company plans to bring in a new product next month.
meanings.translation: A empresa planeja lançar um novo produto no próximo mês.

meanings.meaning: Earn or generate income or revenue.
meanings.example: The new marketing strategy helped bring in more customers.
meanings.translation: A nova estratégia de marketing ajudou a atrair mais clientes.

meanings.meaning: Start a journey or trip.
meanings.example: They set off on a road trip early in the morning.
meanings.translation: Eles partiram para uma viagem de carro de manhã cedo.

meanings.meaning: Cause something to begin, especially an explosion.
meanings.example: The faulty wiring set off a fire in the building.
meanings.translation: A fiação defeituosa causou um incêndio no prédio.

meanings.meaning: Escape or leave a place, often for a vacation.
meanings.example: They decided to get away to a quiet beach for the weekend.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram sair para uma praia tranquila no fim de semana.

meanings.meaning: Avoid punishment or negative consequences.
meanings.example: He got away with cheating on the test.
meanings.translation: Ele escapou de ser punido por colar na prova.

meanings.meaning: Tolerate or endure something undesirable.
meanings.example: She can't put up with his constant complaining anymore.
meanings.translation: Ela não consegue mais suportar as reclamações constantes dele.

meanings.meaning: Accept or bear a difficult situation.
meanings.example: They had to put up with the noisy construction next door.
meanings.translation: Eles tiveram que suportar a construção barulhenta ao lado.

meanings.meaning: Continue or resume an activity.
meanings.example: They decided to carry on with the meeting despite the technical issues.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram continuar com a reunião apesar dos problemas técnicos.

meanings.meaning: Behave or conduct oneself in a certain manner.
meanings.example: He always carries on as if he's the boss.
meanings.translation: Ele sempre se comporta como se fosse o chefe.

meanings.meaning: Display one's abilities or possessions in a boastful way.
meanings.example: He loves to show off his new car to everyone.
meanings.translation: Ele adora exibir seu carro novo para todos.

meanings.meaning: Exaggerate or overemphasize something to gain attention.
meanings.example: She was just showing off when she told that story.
meanings.translation: Ela estava apenas chamando a atenção ao contar aquela história.

meanings.meaning: Start and become established or deeply ingrained.
meanings.example: As the sun set, a sense of calmness set in.
meanings.translation: Conforme o sol se punha, um sentimento de calma se estabelecia.

meanings.meaning: Begin and continue over a period of time.
meanings.example: Rain is expected to set in later this evening.
meanings.translation: A chuva deve começar mais tarde hoje à noite.

meanings.meaning: Return to a previous location.
meanings.example: They plan to get back home before dark.
meanings.translation: Eles planejam voltar para casa antes de escurecer.

meanings.meaning: Recover something that was lost or taken.
meanings.example: I need to get back my umbrella that I left at the office.
meanings.translation: Preciso pegar de volta meu guarda-chuva que deixei no escritório.

meanings.meaning: Have a low opinion or disdain for someone.
meanings.example: He looks down on people who don't share his beliefs.
meanings.translation: Ele olha com desdém para pessoas que não compartilham suas crenças.

meanings.meaning: Treat someone as inferior or less important.
meanings.example: She always looked down on her younger siblings.
meanings.translation: Ela sempre tratou os irmãos mais novos como inferiores.

meanings.meaning: Break into pieces or collapse.
meanings.example: The old bridge started to fall apart during the storm.
meanings.translation: A ponte antiga começou a se desfazer durante a tempestade.

meanings.meaning: Experience a sudden emotional breakdown.
meanings.example: She fell apart after the loss of her pet.
meanings.translation: Ela teve um colapso emocional após a perda do seu animal de estimação.

meanings.meaning: Examine or inspect something.
meanings.example: Please check out the new features of this software.
meanings.translation: Por favor, verifique as novas funcionalidades deste software.

meanings.meaning: Leave a place, often a hotel or store.
meanings.example: We need to check out of the hotel by noon.
meanings.translation: Precisamos fazer o check-out do hotel até o meio-dia.

meanings.meaning: Cause someone or something to fall or collapse.
meanings.example: The strong wind brought down several trees.
meanings.translation: O vento forte derrubou várias árvores.

meanings.meaning: Reduce or decrease something, especially prices.
meanings.example: The company decided to bring down the cost of the product.
meanings.translation: A empresa decidiu reduzir o custo do produto.

meanings.meaning: Leave a vehicle or transportation.
meanings.example: They got off the bus at the next stop.
meanings.translation: Eles desceram do ônibus na próxima parada.

meanings.meaning: Avoid punishment or negative consequences.
meanings.example: He got off with a warning instead of a fine.
meanings.translation: Ele escapou com um aviso em vez de uma multa.

meanings.meaning: Reduce the amount or frequency of something.
meanings.example: I'm trying to cut down on sugar in my diet.
meanings.translation: Estou tentando reduzir o açúcar na minha dieta.

meanings.meaning: Decrease consumption of something, often for health reasons.
meanings.example: The doctor advised him to cut down on caffeine.
meanings.translation: O médico o aconselhou a reduzir a cafeína.

meanings.meaning: Review or examine something in detail.
meanings.example: Let's go over the important points of the presentation.
meanings.translation: Vamos revisar os pontos importantes da apresentação.

meanings.meaning: Cross a place or location.
meanings.example: They need to go over the bridge to reach the other side.
meanings.translation: Eles precisam atravessar a ponte para chegar ao outro lado.

meanings.meaning: Restrain or prevent from advancing or moving forward.
meanings.example: The crowd had to hold back to let the ambulance through.
meanings.translation: A multidão teve que recuar para dar passagem à ambulância.

meanings.meaning: Keep something hidden or not disclosed.
meanings.example: She had to hold back tears during the emotional speech.
meanings.translation: Ela teve que conter as lágrimas durante o discurso emocional.

meanings.meaning: Invent or think of something, often a solution or idea.
meanings.example: They need to come up with a creative marketing strategy.
meanings.translation: Eles precisam criar uma estratégia de marketing criativa.

meanings.meaning: Produce or provide something, often unexpectedly.
meanings.example: She came up with an amazing dessert for the party.
meanings.translation: Ela preparou uma sobremesa incrível para a festa.

meanings.meaning: Enter a vehicle, usually a bus or train.
meanings.example: They got on the train just before it departed.
meanings.translation: Eles entraram no trem pouco antes de ele partir.

meanings.meaning: Make progress or continue with an activity.
meanings.example: Despite challenges, they managed to get on with the project.
meanings.translation: Apesar dos desafios, eles conseguiram continuar com o projeto.

meanings.meaning: Reject an offer or request.
meanings.example: He had to turn down the job offer due to the low salary.
meanings.translation: Ele teve que recusar a oferta de emprego devido ao salário baixo.

meanings.meaning: Decrease the volume or intensity.
meanings.example: Can you turn down the music? It's too loud.
meanings.translation: Você pode diminuir o volume da música? Está muito alto.

meanings.meaning: Wait or remain in a current situation.
meanings.example: Please hold on for a moment; I'll be right back.
meanings.translation: Por favor, aguarde um momento; eu volto já.

meanings.meaning: Grasp or hold something tightly.
meanings.example: She had to hold on to the railing to keep her balance.
meanings.translation: Ela teve que segurar-se na grade para manter o equilíbrio.

meanings.meaning: Place clothing or accessories on oneself.
meanings.example: She put on her coat before going outside.
meanings.translation: Ela vestiu o casaco antes de sair.

meanings.meaning: Perform or present something, like a show or event.
meanings.example: They put on a fantastic concert last night.
meanings.translation: Eles fizeram um show fantástico ontem à noite.

meanings.meaning: Begin or start a new activity or hobby.
meanings.example: He decided to take up playing the guitar.
meanings.translation: Ele decidiu começar a tocar violão.

meanings.meaning: Occupy or fill a certain amount of space or time.
meanings.example: The new furniture takes up a lot of space in the living room.
meanings.translation: Os móveis novos ocupam muito espaço na sala de estar.

meanings.meaning: Encounter or find something unexpectedly.
meanings.example: While hiking, they came across an abandoned cabin.
meanings.translation: Durante a caminhada, eles encontraram uma cabana abandonada.

meanings.meaning: Appear to others in a certain way or manner.
meanings.example: She comes across as confident during her presentations.
meanings.translation: Ela passa uma imagem de confiança durante as apresentações.

meanings.meaning: Escape from a place, especially a confined one.
meanings.example: Several prisoners managed to break out of the jail.
meanings.translation: Vários prisioneiros conseguiram escapar da prisão.

meanings.meaning: Suddenly start or develop, often referring to an event or disease.
meanings.example: A fire broke out in the building due to an electrical issue.
meanings.translation: Um incêndio começou no prédio devido a um problema elétrico.

meanings.meaning: Investigate or examine something thoroughly.
meanings.example: The team will look into the cause of the software error.
meanings.translation: A equipe investigará a causa do erro de software.

meanings.meaning: Consider or study a situation or possibility.
meanings.example: They're looking into the feasibility of expanding the business.
meanings.translation: Eles estão considerando a viabilidade de expandir o negócio.

meanings.meaning: Flee from a place or situation, often to escape danger.
meanings.example: They decided to run away from the dangerous area.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram fugir da área perigosa.

meanings.meaning: Leave suddenly without explanation or notice.
meanings.example: She ran away from home and didn't tell anyone.
meanings.translation: Ela fugiu de casa e não disse a ninguém.

meanings.meaning: Distribute or hand out something to people.
meanings.example: They will give out free samples of the new product.
meanings.translation: Eles vão distribuir amostras grátis do novo produto.

meanings.meaning: Stop working or functioning, often due to exhaustion.
meanings.example: His energy gave out after working for hours.
meanings.translation: Sua energia acabou depois de trabalhar por horas.

meanings.meaning: Successfully communicate or convey a message or idea.
meanings.example: She struggled to get her point across during the debate.
meanings.translation: Ela teve dificuldade em transmitir seu ponto de vista durante o debate.

meanings.meaning: Move from one side to another, often referring to a physical location.
meanings.example: We need to find a way to get across the river.
meanings.translation: Precisamos encontrar uma maneira de atravessar o rio.

meanings.meaning: Assume control or responsibility for something.
meanings.example: He will take over the management of the company.
meanings.translation: Ele assumirá a gestão da empresa.

meanings.meaning: Occupy or possess a place or position.
meanings.example: The new company will take over the old building.
meanings.translation: A nova empresa ocupará o prédio antigo.

meanings.meaning: Use up all of something and have none left.
meanings.example: They ran out of time to complete the project.
meanings.translation: Eles ficaram sem tempo para concluir o projeto.

meanings.meaning: Exhaust the supply of something.
meanings.example: The store has run out of the popular product.
meanings.translation: A loja esgotou o estoque do produto popular.

meanings.meaning: Surrender or quit, often due to difficulty or frustration.
meanings.example: She decided to give up on the challenging puzzle.
meanings.translation: Ela decidiu desistir do quebra-cabeça difícil.

meanings.meaning: Stop doing or attempting something.
meanings.example: He gave up trying to learn the instrument.
meanings.translation: Ele desistiu de tentar aprender o instrumento.

meanings.meaning: Search for information in a reference source.
meanings.example: You can look up the definition in the dictionary.
meanings.translation: Você pode procurar a definição no dicionário.

meanings.meaning: Improve or become better.
meanings.example: Things are finally looking up for their business.
meanings.translation: As coisas finalmente estão melhorando para o negócio deles.

meanings.meaning: Accept something less desirable than what was wanted.
meanings.example: She had to settle for a smaller apartment.
meanings.translation: Ela teve que se contentar com um apartamento menor.

meanings.meaning: Choose or decide on something, often as a compromise.
meanings.example: They settled for pizza since they couldn't agree on a restaurant.
meanings.translation: Eles optaram por pizza, já que não conseguiram concordar sobre um restaurante.

meanings.meaning: Reach the same level as someone or something ahead.
meanings.example: He tried to catch up with the leaders in the race.
meanings.translation: Ele tentou alcançar os líderes na corrida.

meanings.meaning: Engage in a conversation to update on recent events.
meanings.example: Let's catch up over coffee and talk about what's been happening.
meanings.translation: Vamos colocar o papo em dia durante o café e falar sobre o que tem acontecido.

meanings.meaning: End a relationship, often a romantic one.
meanings.example: They decided to break up after years of dating.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram terminar o relacionamento após anos de namoro.

meanings.meaning: Fragment or separate into smaller pieces.
meanings.example: The rock broke up into smaller chunks.
meanings.translation: A rocha se fragmentou em pedaços menores.

meanings.meaning: Return something to its proper place after use.
meanings.example: Don't forget to put away your tools when you're done.
meanings.translation: Não esqueça de guardar suas ferramentas quando terminar.

meanings.meaning: Save or store something for later use.
meanings.example: They decided to put away some money for a vacation.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram guardar dinheiro para as férias.

meanings.meaning: Encounter someone unexpectedly.
meanings.example: I ran into an old friend at the grocery store.
meanings.translation: Eu encontrei um amigo antigo no supermercado.

meanings.meaning: Experience a problem or difficulty.
meanings.example: They ran into technical issues while setting up the equipment.
meanings.translation: Eles tiveram problemas técnicos ao configurar o equipamento.

meanings.meaning: Make a copy of data or files for security.
meanings.example: Remember to back up your important documents regularly.
meanings.translation: Lembre-se de fazer backup dos seus documentos importantes regularmente.

meanings.meaning: Support or assist someone or something.
meanings.example: His team always backs him up in challenging situations.
meanings.translation: Sua equipe sempre o apoia em situações difíceis.

meanings.meaning: Delay or hinder the progress of something.
meanings.example: Traffic congestion held up their arrival at the event.
meanings.translation: O congestionamento de tráfego atrasou a chegada deles ao evento.

meanings.meaning: Rob or steal from someone using threats or force.
meanings.example: They were held up by a masked robber on their way home.
meanings.translation: Eles foram assaltados por um ladrão mascarado a caminho de casa.

meanings.meaning: Raise or mention a topic for discussion.
meanings.example: She decided to bring up the issue during the meeting.
meanings.translation: Ela decidiu levantar a questão durante a reunião.

meanings.meaning: Raise and care for a child or children.
meanings.example: They're working hard to bring up their children well.
meanings.translation: Eles estão se esforçando para criar bem os filhos.

meanings.meaning: Grip or grasp something tightly.
meanings.example: She held onto the railing to avoid slipping.
meanings.translation: Ela segurou-se na grade para evitar escorregar.

meanings.meaning: Keep or retain possession of something.
meanings.example: He likes to hold onto sentimental items from his past.
meanings.translation: Ele gosta de guardar itens sentimentais do passado.

meanings.meaning: Rise from a seated position.
meanings.example: Please stand up and introduce yourself to the group.
meanings.translation: Por favor, levante-se e se apresente ao grupo.

meanings.meaning: Defend or support a particular cause or belief.
meanings.example: He's not afraid to stand up for what he believes in.
meanings.translation: Ele não tem medo de defender o que acredita.

meanings.meaning: Arrive or appear unexpectedly.
meanings.example: She turned up at the party without prior notice.
meanings.translation: Ela apareceu na festa sem aviso prévio.

meanings.meaning: Increase the volume, intensity, or level of something.
meanings.example: Can you turn up the music a little bit?
meanings.translation: Você pode aumentar um pouco o volume da música?

meanings.meaning: Fail to happen or be completed as planned.
meanings.example: Their vacation plans fell through due to unexpected events.
meanings.translation: Os planos de férias deles não se concretizaram devido a eventos inesperados.

meanings.meaning: Break or collapse under pressure or weight.
meanings.example: The old wooden bridge fell through when they tried to cross it.
meanings.translation: A ponte de madeira antiga cedeu quando tentaram atravessá-la.

meanings.meaning: Cause something to happen or occur.
meanings.example: The new policies will bring about positive changes in the company.
meanings.translation: As novas políticas causarão mudanças positivas na empresa.

meanings.meaning: Lead to or result in a particular outcome.
meanings.example: Their efforts brought about a significant increase in sales.
meanings.translation: Os esforços deles resultaram em um aumento significativo nas vendas.

meanings.meaning: Start a journey or trip.
meanings.example: They set off on a road trip across the country.
meanings.translation: Eles partiram para uma viagem de carro pelo país.

meanings.meaning: Cause something to begin, often a reaction or event.
meanings.example: The loud noise set off a panic among the crowd.
meanings.translation: O barulho alto desencadeou o pânico na multidão.

meanings.meaning: Choose or select from a group of options.
meanings.example: She managed to pick out the best dress for the occasion.
meanings.translation: Ela conseguiu escolher o melhor vestido para a ocasião.

meanings.meaning: Identify or notice someone or something in a crowd.
meanings.example: He could easily pick out his friend from a distance.
meanings.translation: Ele conseguiu identificar facilmente o amigo dele à distância.

meanings.meaning: Hit or drive over someone or something with a vehicle.
meanings.example: The driver accidentally ran over a bicycle in the parking lot.
meanings.translation: O motorista atropelou acidentalmente uma bicicleta no estacionamento.

meanings.meaning: Review or repeat something quickly.
meanings.example: Let's run over the main points of the presentation before the meeting.
meanings.translation: Vamos revisar rapidamente os principais pontos da apresentação antes da reunião.

meanings.meaning: Fail to keep up with a required pace or schedule.
meanings.example: He fell behind in his studies due to illness.
meanings.translation: Ele atrasou nos estudos devido à doença.

meanings.meaning: Lose progress or advancement in a competition or race.
meanings.example: The runner fell behind during the final stretch of the race.
meanings.translation: O corredor atrasou na reta final da corrida.

meanings.meaning: Postpone or delay something.
meanings.example: They decided to hold off the project until they had more resources.
meanings.translation: Eles decidiram adiar o projeto até terem mais recursos.

meanings.meaning: Prevent or keep something from happening.
meanings.example: The umbrella held off the rain for a while.
meanings.translation: O guarda-chuva impediu a chuva por um tempo.

meanings.meaning: Introduce or implement something new.
meanings.example: The company plans to bring in a new management system.
meanings.translation: A empresa planeja implementar um novo sistema de gestão.

meanings.meaning: Earn or generate income or revenue.
meanings.example: The new marketing campaign helped bring in more customers.
meanings.translation: A nova campanha de marketing ajudou a atrair mais clientes.

meanings.meaning: Hold onto something tightly.
meanings.example: Hang on to the railing as you go down the stairs.
meanings.translation: Segure-se na grade ao descer as escadas.

meanings.meaning: Wait or remain in a situation for a short time.
meanings.example: Hang on for a moment; I'll be right there.
meanings.translation: Aguarde um momento; já estou indo.

meanings.meaning: Rotate or change the direction of something.
meanings.example: She tried to turn around the key in the lock.
meanings.translation: Ela tentou girar a chave na fechadura.

meanings.meaning: Change a situation from negative to positive.
meanings.example: The company managed to turn around its financial performance.
meanings.translation: A empresa conseguiu reverter sua performance financeira.

meanings.meaning: Wish someone good luck or success, often before a performance or event.
meanings.example: Before going on stage, the cast members told each other to break a leg.
meanings.translation: Antes de subir ao palco, os membros do elenco desejaram boa sorte uns aos outros.

meanings.meaning: Express encouragement and confidence in someone's abilities.
meanings.example: You've prepared well for the presentation. Just go out there and break a leg!
meanings.translation: Você se preparou bem para a apresentação. Apenas vá lá e arrase!

meanings.meaning: Indicates that something is very easy or simple to accomplish.
meanings.example: Completing this task will be a piece of cake for you.
meanings.translation: Completar essa tarefa será moleza para você.

meanings.meaning: Expresses agreement with a plan or suggestion.
meanings.example: Want to go to the movies tonight? Sure, that's a piece of cake!
meanings.translation: Quer ir ao cinema hoje à noite? Claro, isso é moleza!

expression: Hit the nail on the head

meanings.meaning: Accurately describe or identify the main point or issue.
meanings.example: She hit the nail on the head with her analysis of the problem.
meanings.translation: Ela acertou na mosca com a análise do problema.

meanings.meaning: Say something that is exactly right or relevant to the situation.
meanings.example: His comment about the issue really hit the nail on the head.
meanings.translation: O comentário dele sobre a questão foi muito preciso.

meanings.meaning: Feeling extremely happy, joyful, or elated.
meanings.example: After winning the championship, he was on cloud nine.
meanings.translation: Depois de vencer o campeonato, ele estava nas nuvens.

meanings.meaning: Experiencing a state of euphoria or great satisfaction.
meanings.example: She's been on cloud nine ever since her promotion.
meanings.translation: Ela está nas nuvens desde que foi promovida.

meanings.meaning: Feeling unwell or sick.
meanings.example: She's been feeling under the weather and stayed home from work.
meanings.translation: Ela tem se sentido mal e ficou em casa do trabalho.

meanings.meaning: Experiencing a mild illness or discomfort.
meanings.example: I think I'm coming down with something; I've been a bit under the weather.
meanings.translation: Acho que estou começando a ficar doente; tenho me sentido um pouco indisposto.

meanings.meaning: Raining very heavily.
meanings.example: We can't go out; it's been raining cats and dogs all day.
meanings.translation: Não podemos sair; está chovendo muito forte o dia todo.

meanings.meaning: Experiencing a torrential downpour.
meanings.example: We got soaked because it was raining cats and dogs during the walk.
meanings.translation: Ficamos encharcados porque estava chovendo muito durante a caminhada.

meanings.meaning: Pursuing the wrong course of action or making a mistaken assumption.
meanings.example: If you think I'm the one who took your book, you're barking up the wrong tree.
meanings.translation: Se você acha que fui eu quem pegou o seu livro, está enganado.

meanings.meaning: Accusing the wrong person or entity for something.
meanings.example: They're barking up the wrong tree by blaming the wrong department for the mistake.
meanings.translation: Eles estão acusando a área errada pelo erro.

meanings.meaning: Regretting something that has already happened and cannot be changed.
meanings.example: There's no use crying over spilled milk; let's find a solution instead.
meanings.translation: Não adianta chorar pelo leite derramado; vamos encontrar uma solução em vez disso.

meanings.meaning: Worrying excessively about minor mistakes or issues.
meanings.example: Stop crying over spilled milk; it's just a small error that can be fixed.
meanings.translation: Pare de se preocupar tanto com pequenos erros; é apenas um erro pequeno que pode ser corrigido.

expression: In the heat of the moment

meanings.meaning: Reacting impulsively or emotionally without careful consideration.
meanings.example: He said things he didn't mean in the heat of the moment.
meanings.translation: Ele disse coisas que não quis dizer no calor do momento.

meanings.meaning: During a period of strong emotions or excitement.
meanings.example: In the heat of the moment, they made a spontaneous decision to go on a road trip.
meanings.translation: No calor do momento, eles tomaram a decisão espontânea de fazer uma viagem de carro.

meanings.meaning: Don't waste time regretting things that have already happened and cannot be changed.
meanings.example: She told her friend not to cry over spilt milk and to focus on moving forward.
meanings.translation: Ela disse para a amiga não chorar pelo leite derramado e focar em seguir em frente.

meanings.meaning: Advises against dwelling on past mistakes; instead, learn from them and move on.
meanings.example: He reminded himself not to cry over spilt milk and to find a solution for the future.
meanings.translation: Ele se lembrou de não chorar pelo leite derramado e encontrar uma solução para o futuro.

meanings.meaning: Start an activity or process to initiate progress or momentum.
meanings.example: Let's get the ball rolling by brainstorming ideas for the project.
meanings.translation: Vamos começar a atividade gerando ideias para o projeto.

meanings.meaning: Take the first step to kick-start a project or plan.
meanings.example: She wanted to get the ball rolling on the new initiative as soon as possible.
meanings.translation: Ela queria iniciar a nova iniciativa o mais rápido possível.

meanings.meaning: Choose to ignore or pretend not to notice something, often due to convenience.
meanings.example: The teacher turned a blind eye to students whispering during the exam.
meanings.translation: A professora fez vista grossa para os alunos cochichando durante a prova.

meanings.meaning: Deliberately avoid acknowledging a certain situation or behavior.
meanings.example: Some people turn a blind eye to unfair practices in order to maintain peace.
meanings.translation: Algumas pessoas fazem vista grossa para práticas injustas para manter a paz.

meanings.meaning: Make an additional effort to achieve success or provide exceptional service.
meanings.example: He always goes the extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction.
meanings.translation: Ele sempre se esforça ao máximo para garantir a satisfação do cliente.

meanings.meaning: Exceed expectations by putting in more effort than required.
meanings.example: The team decided to go the extra mile to deliver a flawless presentation.
meanings.translation: A equipe decidiu se esforçar ao máximo para entregar uma apresentação impecável.

meanings.meaning: Be expensive or have a high cost.
meanings.example: That designer dress must have cost her a pretty penny.
meanings.translation: Aquele vestido de grife deve ter custado uma boa quantia para ela.

meanings.meaning: Require a significant amount of money to purchase or obtain.
meanings.example: The luxury vacation they took must have cost a pretty penny.
meanings.translation: As férias de luxo que eles fizeram devem ter custado uma boa quantia.

meanings.meaning: Monitor or watch someone or something closely.
meanings.example: Parents need to keep an eye on their children while they play.
meanings.translation: Os pais precisam ficar de olho nas crianças enquanto elas brincam.

meanings.meaning: Pay attention to or be vigilant about a situation.
meanings.example: It's important to keep an eye on market trends in our industry.
meanings.translation: É importante ficar de olho nas tendências do mercado em nossa indústria.

meanings.meaning: Act prematurely or start something before it's appropriate.
meanings.example: He jumped the gun by announcing the project before it was fully approved.
meanings.translation: Ele agiu precipitadamente ao anunciar o projeto antes da aprovação completa.

meanings.meaning: Begin an action or activity too early, without proper preparation.
meanings.example: She jumped the gun by entering the competition without proper training.
meanings.translation: Ela agiu precipitadamente ao participar da competição sem o treinamento adequado.

meanings.meaning: Make a fresh start or commit to changing one's behavior.
meanings.example: After the incident, he decided to turn over a new leaf and improve his life.
meanings.translation: Após o incidente, ele decidiu recomeçar e melhorar a vida.

meanings.meaning: Embark on a new positive path or adopt a better lifestyle.
meanings.example: She promised to turn over a new leaf by focusing on her health and well-being.
meanings.translation: Ela prometeu recomeçar focando em sua saúde e bem-estar.

meanings.meaning: Experience a sudden and significant success or stroke of luck.
meanings.example: Winning the lottery felt like hitting the jackpot.
meanings.translation: Ganhar na loteria pareceu como acertar o jackpot.

meanings.meaning: Achieve a major accomplishment or gain a substantial reward.
meanings.example: His new invention hit the jackpot in terms of popularity and sales.
meanings.translation: A nova invenção dele foi um sucesso estrondoso em termos de popularidade e vendas.

expression: The ball is in your court

meanings.meaning: It's now your turn to make a decision or take action.
meanings.example: I've given you all the information you need. The ball is in your court.
meanings.translation: Eu te forneci todas as informações de que você precisa. Agora a decisão está em suas mãos.

meanings.meaning: The responsibility or opportunity to act is with you.
meanings.example: You need to decide whether to accept the job offer. The ball is in your court.
meanings.translation: Você precisa decidir se aceita a oferta de emprego. A bola está com você.

meanings.meaning: Listening attentively and eagerly to what someone is saying.
meanings.example: I'm all ears. Tell me about your exciting trip!
meanings.translation: Estou ouvindo atentamente. Conte-me sobre sua viagem emocionante!

meanings.meaning: Fully engaged and ready to listen to someone's story or information.
meanings.example: He said he had news to share, so I was all ears to hear what he had to say.
meanings.translation: Ele disse que tinha notícias para compartilhar, então fiquei todo ouvidos para ouvir o que ele tinha a dizer.

expression: Every cloud has a silver lining

meanings.meaning: In every difficult situation, there is a positive or hopeful aspect.
meanings.example: Losing the job was tough, but every cloud has a silver lining; I'm exploring new opportunities.
meanings.translation: Perder o emprego foi difícil, mas todo problema tem um lado positivo; estou explorando novas oportunidades.

meanings.meaning: There's something good or beneficial even in challenging circumstances.
meanings.example: The setback was disappointing, but every cloud has a silver lining; I learned valuable lessons.
meanings.translation: O contratempo foi decepcionante, mas toda dificuldade tem um lado positivo; aprendi lições valiosas.

meanings.meaning: Severing or damaging relationships with others, often irreversibly.
meanings.example: By spreading rumors, she was unknowingly burning bridges with her colleagues.
meanings.translation: Ao espalhar rumores, ela estava, sem saber, queimando pontes com seus colegas.

meanings.meaning: Taking actions that create hostility or prevent future cooperation.
meanings.example: His rude behavior toward the team was a clear case of burning bridges.
meanings.translation: O comportamento rude dele em relação à equipe foi um claro caso de queimar pontes.

meanings.meaning: It's preferable to do something late than not doing it at all.
meanings.example: He finally apologized for being late to the meeting. Better late than never.
meanings.translation: Ele finalmente pediu desculpas por chegar atrasado à reunião. Mais vale tarde do que nunca.

expression: The early bird catches the worm

meanings.meaning: Those who act early or arrive first have an advantage.
meanings.example: She always arrives at the office early to get a head start on her work. The early bird catches the worm.
meanings.translation: Ela sempre chega cedo no escritório para começar o trabalho mais cedo. Quem cedo madruga, Deus ajuda.

meanings.meaning: Be patient and wait.
meanings.example: He's excited to start the project, but he needs to hold his horses until we have all the details.
meanings.translation: Ele está ansioso para começar o projeto, mas precisa ter paciência até que tenhamos todos os detalhes.

expression: The writing is on the wall

meanings.meaning: There are clear signs or indications of a future event or outcome.
meanings.example: With declining sales and increased competition, the writing is on the wall for the company's future.
meanings.translation: Com as vendas em queda e a concorrência aumentando, os sinais estão claros quanto ao futuro da empresa.

meanings.meaning: A share or portion of something, usually referring to profits or benefits.
meanings.example: Every employee will receive a piece of the pie from the company's success.
meanings.translation: Cada funcionário receberá uma parte do bolo do sucesso da empresa.

meanings.meaning: What people do is more important than what they say.
meanings.example: He promised to help, but his actions speak louder than words; he never showed up.
meanings.translation: Ele prometeu ajudar, mas suas ações valem mais do que palavras; ele nunca apareceu.

meanings.meaning: People who are in need must accept what they are given.
meanings.example: She didn't like the job offer, but beggars can't be choosers; she needs the income.
meanings.translation: Ela não gostou da oferta de emprego, mas quem está na chuva é para se molhar; ela precisa da renda.

expression: Don't count your chickens before they're hatched

meanings.meaning: Don't make assumptions about future outcomes; wait until they happen.
meanings.example: He's already planning how to spend his promotion bonus, but don't count your chickens before they're hatched.
meanings.translation: Ele já está planejando como gastar seu bônus de promoção, mas não conte com o ovo no fiofó da galinha.

meanings.meaning: In a concise or summarized form.
meanings.example: To explain in a nutshell, the project aims to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
meanings.translation: Para explicar resumidamente, o projeto visa melhorar a eficiência e reduzir os custos.

expression: The pot calling the kettle black

meanings.meaning: Criticism from someone who is guilty of the same thing they're criticizing.
meanings.example: He accused her of being lazy, but it's like the pot calling the kettle black; he's not much different.
meanings.translation: Ele a acusou de ser preguiçosa, mas é como o sujo falando do mal lavado; ele não é muito diferente.

expression: Don't put all your eggs in one basket

meanings.meaning: Don't risk everything on a single venture; diversify your investments or efforts.
meanings.example: He advised his friend not to invest all his savings in one stock; don't put all your eggs in one basket.
meanings.translation: Ele aconselhou o amigo a não investir todas as suas economias em uma única ação; não coloque todos os ovos na mesma cesta.

expression: The proof is in the pudding

meanings.meaning: The results or evidence of something are the most convincing.
meanings.example: He claimed the new software would increase efficiency, and the proof is in the pudding; tasks are getting done faster.
meanings.translation: Ele afirmou que o novo software aumentaria a eficiência, e os resultados estão à vista; as tarefas estão sendo feitas mais rapidamente.

meanings.meaning: Everything related to a particular matter or situation.
meanings.example: He wanted to know all the details about the project, so I explained the whole nine yards.
meanings.translation: Ele queria saber todos os detalhes sobre o projeto, então expliquei tudo nos mínimos detalhes.

meanings.meaning: Something that is very expensive.
meanings.example: Buying that luxury car would cost an arm and a leg.
meanings.translation: Comprar aquele carro de luxo custaria uma fortuna.

meanings.meaning: Starting over because the previous attempt or plan failed.
meanings.example: The initial design was rejected, so they had to go back to the drawing board.
meanings.translation: O design inicial foi rejeitado, então eles tiveram que recomeçar do zero.

meanings.meaning: Stay optimistic and positive during challenging times.
meanings.example: Even though things are tough now, keep your chin up; better days will come.
meanings.translation: Mesmo que as coisas estejam difíceis agora, mantenha a cabeça erguida; dias melhores virão.

meanings.meaning: Give up on a task or endeavor.
meanings.example: After multiple failed attempts, he decided to throw in the towel and quit.
meanings.translation: Após várias tentativas fracassadas, ele decidiu jogar a toalha e desistir.

meanings.meaning: Something that is very easy to do.
meanings.example: Completing this assignment is a piece of cake; I've done similar tasks before.
meanings.translation: Completar essa tarefa é moleza; já fiz tarefas parecidas antes.

meanings.meaning: A peaceful or quiet period before a difficult or chaotic situation.
meanings.example: The office was quiet, but everyone knew it was the calm before the storm of a major project deadline.
meanings.translation: O escritório estava tranquilo, mas todos sabiam que era a calmaria antes da tempestade do prazo de um grande projeto.

expression: Cost an arm and a leg

meanings.meaning: Be extremely expensive.
meanings.example: The luxury vacation he went on must have cost him an arm and a leg.
meanings.translation: As férias de luxo que ele fez devem ter custado uma fortuna.

expression: Every cloud has a silver lining

meanings.meaning: In every negative situation, there is a positive aspect.
meanings.example: Losing his job was tough, but every cloud has a silver lining; he's now pursuing a new career path.
meanings.translation: Perder o emprego foi difícil, mas todo problema tem seu lado positivo; ele agora está seguindo uma nova carreira.

expression: Don't judge a book by its cover

meanings.meaning: Don't form an opinion about someone or something based solely on appearance.
meanings.example: She thought he was unfriendly because of his stern expression, but she learned not to judge a book by its cover.
meanings.translation: Ela achou que ele era antipático por causa de sua expressão séria, mas aprendeu a não julgar pela aparência.

meanings.meaning: A small, insignificant amount compared to a larger whole.
meanings.example: The donation he made was just a drop in the bucket compared to what's needed for the charity project.
meanings.translation: A doação que ele fez foi apenas uma gota no oceano em comparação com o que é necessário para o projeto beneficente.

expression: Get off on the wrong foot

meanings.meaning: Start a relationship or situation with a mistake or misunderstanding.
meanings.example: Their first meeting was awkward, and they seemed to get off on the wrong foot.
meanings.translation: O primeiro encontro deles foi estranho, e eles pareceram começar com o pé esquerdo.

expression: You can't judge a book by its cover

meanings.meaning: One should not form an opinion about someone or something based solely on appearance.
meanings.example: She may seem reserved, but you can't judge a book by its cover; she's actually very friendly.
meanings.translation: Ela pode parecer reservada, mas não se pode julgar pelas aparências; ela é na verdade muito simpática.

expression: Don't throw the baby out with the bathwater

meanings.meaning: Don't discard something valuable while trying to get rid of something undesirable.
meanings.example: While making changes to the project, be careful not to throw the baby out with the bathwater.
meanings.translation: Ao fazer mudanças no projeto, tenha cuidado para não jogar fora o bebê junto com a água do banho.

meanings.meaning: Acting too quickly can lead to mistakes that require more time to fix.
meanings.example: He rushed through the project and made errors. Haste makes waste, after all.
meanings.translation: Ele fez o projeto às pressas e cometeu erros. A pressa é inimiga da perfeição, afinal.

expression: The early bird catches the worm

meanings.meaning: Those who act early or arrive first have an advantage.
meanings.example: She arrived at the store early to get the best deals. The early bird catches the worm.
meanings.translation: Ela chegou à loja cedo para aproveitar as melhores ofertas. Quem cedo madruga, pega o verme.

meanings.meaning: Understand the hidden meaning or implication in something that is said or written.
meanings.example: Her email sounded positive, but if you read between the lines, it seems she's not satisfied.
meanings.translation: O e-mail dela parecia positivo, mas lendo nas entrelinhas, parece que ela não está satisfeita.

meanings.meaning: In a risky or dangerous situation that could have negative consequences.
meanings.example: He's been late to work multiple times; he's on thin ice with his boss.
meanings.translation: Ele já chegou atrasado no trabalho várias vezes; ele está pisando em ovos com o chefe.

expression: Caught between a rock and a hard place

meanings.meaning: In a difficult situation with no good options or choices.
meanings.example: He was caught between a rock and a hard place; he had to choose between two equally undesirable options.
meanings.translation: Ele estava entre a cruz e a espada; teve que escolher entre duas opções igualmente indesejáveis.

expression: The ball is in your court

meanings.meaning: It's now your turn to make a decision or take action.
meanings.example: I've provided all the necessary information. The ball is in your court now.
meanings.translation: Eu forneci todas as informações necessárias. Agora a decisão está nas suas mãos.

expression: Let the cat out of the bag

meanings.meaning: Reveal a secret or unintentionally disclose information.
meanings.example: She accidentally let the cat out of the bag about the surprise party.
meanings.translation: Ela sem querer deixou escapar sobre a festa surpresa.

meanings.meaning: Wish someone good luck, especially before a performance or event.
meanings.example: She's nervous about her stage debut tonight. I told her to break a leg!
meanings.translation: Ela está nervosa para sua estreia no palco hoje à noite. Eu disse para ela 'boa sorte'!

expression: Hit the nail on the head

meanings.meaning: State something accurately or describe a situation perfectly.
meanings.example: His analysis hit the nail on the head; he captured the essence of the issue.
meanings.translation: Sua análise foi precisa; ele capturou a essência do problema.

meanings.meaning: Don't waste time regretting something that has already happened and cannot be changed.
meanings.example: Yes, the project failed, but don't cry over spilled milk. Let's focus on the next steps.
meanings.translation: Sim, o projeto fracassou, mas não adianta chorar pelo leite derramado. Vamos focar nos próximos passos.

meanings.meaning: Face a difficult or unpleasant situation with courage and determination.
meanings.example: He knew the task was challenging, but he had to bite the bullet and get it done.
meanings.translation: Ele sabia que a tarefa era desafiadora, mas teve que encarar de frente e fazer acontecer.

meanings.meaning: Get to the main point or focus on what's important without unnecessary details.
meanings.example: Let's cut to the chase and discuss the key findings of the report.
meanings.translation: Vamos direto ao ponto e discutir as principais conclusões do relatório.

meanings.meaning: Avoid addressing a topic directly or speaking candidly.
meanings.example: Instead of beating around the bush, just tell me what you think about the proposal.
meanings.translation: Em vez de rodeios, me diga o que você pensa sobre a proposta.

expression: Don't put the cart before the horse

meanings.meaning: Don't do things in the wrong order; prioritize tasks correctly.
meanings.example: He wanted to launch the product before finalizing the design. Don't put the cart before the horse.
meanings.translation: Ele queria lançar o produto antes de finalizar o design. Não coloque o carro na frente dos bois.

meanings.meaning: Someone mentioned the person who just appeared or arrived.
meanings.example: Speak of the devil! We were just talking about you.
meanings.translation: Falando no diabo! Estávamos justamente falando sobre você.

meanings.meaning: Something that is unlikely or will never happen.
meanings.example: Sure, I'll lend you my rare book collection when pigs fly.
meanings.translation: Claro, emprestarei minha coleção de livros raros quando os porcos voarem.

meanings.meaning: Don't waste time regretting something that has already happened and cannot be changed.
meanings.example: Yes, the project failed, but don't cry over spilled milk. Let's focus on the next steps.
meanings.translation: Sim, o projeto falhou, mas não adianta chorar pelo leite derramado. Vamos focar nos próximos passos.

expression: A picture is worth a thousand words

meanings.meaning: A visual representation can convey complex information more effectively than words.
meanings.example: The infographic explained the concept clearly; a picture is worth a thousand words.
meanings.translation: O infográfico explicou o conceito de forma clara; uma imagem vale mais que mil palavras.

meanings.meaning: Working late into the night, especially to complete a task or project.
meanings.example: With the deadline approaching, she was burning the midnight oil to finish the report.
meanings.translation: Com o prazo se aproximando, ela estava virando a noite para terminar o relatório.

expression: Two heads are better than one

meanings.meaning: Collaboration and brainstorming lead to better ideas and solutions.
meanings.example: Let's work together on this project. Two heads are better than one.
meanings.translation: Vamos trabalhar juntos neste projeto. Duas cabeças pensam melhor que uma.

meanings.meaning: Time seems to move slower when you're waiting for something.
meanings.example: He kept checking the clock, but the time felt like it was dragging. A watched pot never boils.
meanings.translation: Ele ficava olhando para o relógio, mas o tempo parecia passar devagar. Olho que não vê, coração que não sente.

expression: Birds of a feather flock together

meanings.meaning: People with similar interests or characteristics tend to associate with each other.
meanings.example: He and his friends all love playing music. Birds of a feather flock together.
meanings.translation: Ele e seus amigos todos amam tocar música. Quem se parece se ajunta.

expression: Don't count your chickens before they're hatched

meanings.meaning: Don't make assumptions about future outcomes; wait until they happen.
meanings.example: He's already making plans for the prize money, but don't count your chickens before they're hatched.
meanings.translation: Ele já está fazendo planos para o prêmio, mas não conte com o ovo no fiofó da galinha.

expression: Every cloud has a silver lining

meanings.meaning: In every negative situation, there is a positive aspect.
meanings.example: Losing the job was tough, but every cloud has a silver lining; he discovered a new career path.
meanings.translation: Perder o emprego foi difícil, mas todo problema tem seu lado positivo; ele descobriu uma nova carreira.

expression: Kill two birds with one stone

meanings.meaning: Accomplish two tasks or objectives with a single action.
meanings.example: By going to the supermarket on the way home, she killed two birds with one stone.
meanings.translation: Ao passar no supermercado a caminho de casa, ela matou dois coelhos com uma cajadada só.

meanings.meaning: Asking someone to share their thoughts or opinions.
meanings.example: You seem lost in thought. A penny for your thoughts?
meanings.translation: Você parece absorto em pensamentos. O que está pensando?

meanings.meaning: Working late into the night, especially to complete a task or project.
meanings.example: With the project deadline approaching, she was burning the midnight oil to finish the presentation.
meanings.translation: Trabalhando até tarde da noite, especialmente para concluir uma tarefa ou projeto. Com o prazo do projeto se aproximando, ela estava virando a noite para terminar a apresentação.

meanings.meaning: Go to bed; go to sleep.
meanings.example: After a long day at work, he was exhausted and ready to hit the hay.
meanings.translation: Ir para a cama; ir dormir. Após um longo dia de trabalho, ele estava exausto e pronto para ir dormir.

meanings.meaning: An expression of contentment upon returning to one's own home.
meanings.example: After a week of traveling, she finally arrived back home. Home sweet home!
meanings.translation: Uma expressão de contentamento ao retornar à própria casa. Depois de uma semana viajando, ela finalmente chegou em casa. Lar, doce lar!

expression: A place for everything and everything in its place

meanings.meaning: The idea that items should be organized and stored properly.
meanings.example: She believed in keeping her living space tidy—'a place for everything and everything in its place.'
meanings.translation: A ideia de que os itens devem ser organizados e guardados corretamente. Ela acreditava em manter seu espaço arrumado - 'cada coisa em seu lugar e um lugar para cada coisa'.

expression: Home is where the heart is

meanings.meaning: A home is defined by the people and relationships, not the physical structure.
meanings.example: Although they moved frequently, they always made a home wherever they were; home is where the heart is.
meanings.translation: Um lar é definido pelas pessoas e pelos relacionamentos, não pela estrutura física. Mesmo que se mudassem frequentemente, sempre criavam um lar onde estavam; o lar está onde o coração está.

expression: Home is where you hang your hat

meanings.meaning: Your home is wherever you are comfortable and settled.
meanings.example: After years of traveling, he found a sense of belonging in the small town. Home is where you hang your hat.
meanings.translation: Sua casa é onde você se sente confortável e estabelecido. Após anos de viagem, ele encontrou um senso de pertencimento na pequena cidade. Lar é onde você coloca seu chapéu.

meanings.meaning: In trouble or out of favor with someone.
meanings.example: After forgetting their anniversary, he was in the doghouse with his wife.
meanings.translation: Em apuros ou desfavorecido com alguém. Após esquecer o aniversário deles, ele estava em maus lençóis com a esposa.

meanings.meaning: A person who spends a lot of time sitting or lying on the couch, watching television.
meanings.example: He's become a real couch potato, spending most evenings watching TV.
meanings.translation: Uma pessoa que passa muito tempo sentada ou deitada no sofá, assistindo televisão. Ele virou um verdadeiro 'couch potato', passando a maioria das noites assistindo TV.

meanings.meaning: A storage space in a house for bed linens, towels, and other fabric items.
meanings.example: She organized the towels and sheets in the linen closet.
meanings.translation: Um espaço de armazenamento em uma casa para lençóis de cama, toalhas e outros itens de tecido. Ela organizou as toalhas e os lençóis no armário de roupas de cama.

meanings.meaning: A device or piece of furniture used for hanging coats, hats, and other outerwear.
meanings.example: The entryway had a coat rack for guests to hang their jackets.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo ou móvel usado para pendurar casacos, chapéus e outras roupas externas. A entrada tinha um cabideiro para os convidados pendurarem seus casacos.

meanings.meaning: A low table placed in front of a sofa or seating area for holding drinks, books, etc.
meanings.example: They placed the snacks and drinks on the coffee table during the movie night.
meanings.translation: Uma mesa baixa colocada na frente de um sofá ou área de estar para segurar bebidas, livros, etc. Eles colocaram os petiscos e as bebidas na mesa de centro durante a noite de filmes.

meanings.meaning: A long and narrow rug placed in a hallway to protect the floor and add decoration.
meanings.example: She chose a colorful hallway runner to brighten up the entrance area.
meanings.translation: Um tapete longo e estreito colocado em um corredor para proteger o piso e adicionar decoração. Ela escolheu um tapete colorido para alegrar a área de entrada.

meanings.meaning: A piece of furniture with glass doors used for storing and displaying china and dishware.
meanings.example: The dining room was adorned with a beautifully crafted china cabinet.
meanings.translation: Um móvel com portas de vidro usado para armazenar e exibir porcelana e louças. A sala de jantar estava decorada com um belo armário de porcelana.

meanings.meaning: An electric fan suspended from the ceiling that circulates air to provide cooling.
meanings.example: They turned on the ceiling fan to help cool down the room on a hot day.
meanings.translation: Um ventilador elétrico suspenso do teto que circula o ar para proporcionar resfriamento. Eles ligaram o ventilador de teto para ajudar a refrescar o ambiente em um dia quente.

meanings.meaning: A piece of furniture with shelves used for storing books and other items.
meanings.example: She arranged her favorite novels on the bookshelf in the living room.
meanings.translation: Um móvel com prateleiras usado para guardar livros e outros itens. Ela organizou seus romances favoritos na estante da sala de estar.

meanings.meaning: A fixture used for holding and dispensing toilet paper rolls in a bathroom.
meanings.example: He realized the toilet paper holder was empty and quickly replaced it.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo usado para segurar e dispensar rolos de papel higiênico em um banheiro. Ele percebeu que o suporte de papel higiênico estava vazio e rapidamente o substituiu.

meanings.meaning: A shelf or structure above a fireplace used for decoration or displaying items.
meanings.example: During the holidays, they hang stockings on the fireplace mantle.
meanings.translation: Uma prateleira ou estrutura acima de uma lareira usada para decoração ou exibição de itens. Durante as festas de fim de ano, eles penduram meias na lareira.

meanings.meaning: A curtain that hangs around a bathtub or shower to prevent water from splashing out.
meanings.example: She chose a colorful shower curtain to add a pop of color to the bathroom.
meanings.translation: Uma cortina que fica ao redor de uma banheira ou chuveiro para evitar que a água respingue para fora. Ela escolheu uma cortina de chuveiro colorida para adicionar um toque de cor ao banheiro.

meanings.meaning: A mat placed at the entrance of a house to wipe dirt from shoes.
meanings.example: They had a friendly 'Welcome' message on their doormat.
meanings.translation: Um tapete colocado na entrada de uma casa para limpar a sujeira dos sapatos. Eles tinham uma mensagem amigável 'Bem-vindo' em seu tapete de entrada.

meanings.meaning: A removable cover for a pillow, often made of fabric.
meanings.example: She changed the pillowcases regularly to keep the bedding fresh.
meanings.translation: Uma capa removível para um travesseiro, frequentemente feita de tecido. Ela trocava as fronhas regularmente para manter a roupa de cama fresca.

meanings.meaning: A table where meals are served and eaten.
meanings.example: They gathered around the dining table for a family dinner.
meanings.translation: Uma mesa onde as refeições são servidas e consumidas. Eles se reuniram em torno da mesa de jantar para um jantar em família.

meanings.meaning: A clock that is mounted on a wall to tell the time.
meanings.example: The wall clock in the kitchen is always a few minutes fast.
meanings.translation: Um relógio que é fixado na parede para marcar a hora. O relógio de parede na cozinha está sempre alguns minutos adiantado.

meanings.meaning: A basin in the kitchen used for washing dishes and food preparation.
meanings.example: She washed the vegetables in the kitchen sink before cooking.
meanings.translation: Uma pia na cozinha usada para lavar pratos e preparar alimentos. Ela lavou os vegetais na pia da cozinha antes de cozinhar.

meanings.meaning: Decorative items or artwork that are hung on walls for aesthetic purposes.
meanings.example: They displayed a collection of colorful paintings as wall art in the living room.
meanings.translation: Itens decorativos ou obras de arte que são pendurados nas paredes por razões estéticas. Eles exibiram uma coleção de pinturas coloridas como arte de parede na sala de estar.

meanings.meaning: A mirror placed in a bathroom for personal grooming and reflection.
meanings.example: He looked at himself in the bathroom mirror before heading out.
meanings.translation: Um espelho colocado em um banheiro para cuidados pessoais e reflexão. Ele se olhou no espelho do banheiro antes de sair.

meanings.meaning: An electrical device used for cleaning floors and carpets by suction.
meanings.example: She used the vacuum cleaner to clean up the pet hair from the living room.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo elétrico usado para limpar pisos e carpetes por sucção. Ela usou o aspirador de pó para limpar os pelos de animais da sala de estar.

meanings.meaning: A small table placed beside a bed for holding items like lamps, books, or alarms.
meanings.example: He kept his glasses and a book on the bedside table before going to sleep.
meanings.translation: Uma mesa pequena colocada ao lado de uma cama para guardar itens como lâmpadas, livros ou alarmes. Ele deixou seus óculos e um livro na mesa de cabeceira antes de dormir.

meanings.meaning: A suspended seat attached to a frame in the backyard for swinging.
meanings.example: The children enjoyed playing on the backyard swing during the weekends.
meanings.translation: Um assento suspenso preso a uma estrutura no quintal para balançar. As crianças gostavam de brincar no balanço do quintal nos fins de semana.

meanings.meaning: The main entrance door of a house or building.
meanings.example: She answered the knock on the front door and greeted the guests.
meanings.translation: A porta de entrada principal de uma casa ou prédio. Ela atendeu a batida na porta da frente e cumprimentou os convidados.

meanings.meaning: A small decorative magnet attached to a refrigerator.
meanings.example: They collected fridge magnets from different places they visited.
meanings.translation: Um pequeno ímã decorativo fixado em uma geladeira. Eles colecionavam ímãs de geladeira de diferentes lugares que visitavam.

meanings.meaning: A large cabinet used for storing clothes and accessories.
meanings.example: She organized her clothes and shoes in the wardrobe closet.
meanings.translation: Um armário grande usado para guardar roupas e acessórios. Ela organizou suas roupas e sapatos no guarda-roupa.

meanings.meaning: A container used for growing plants indoors or outdoors.
meanings.example: She placed a beautiful flowering plant in the living room plant pot.
meanings.translation: Um recipiente usado para cultivar plantas dentro ou fora de casa. Ela colocou uma bela planta florída no vaso da sala de estar.

meanings.meaning: Adjustable coverings for windows to control light and privacy.
meanings.example: They closed the window blinds to block out the harsh sunlight.
meanings.translation: Cortinas ajustáveis para janelas para controlar a luz e a privacidade. Eles fecharam as persianas para bloquear a luz solar intensa.

meanings.meaning: A decorative hanging light fixture with multiple branches or arms.
meanings.example: The elegant chandelier in the dining room added a touch of luxury.
meanings.translation: Um lustre decorativo suspenso com múltiplos braços. O elegante lustre na sala de jantar adicionou um toque de luxo.

meanings.meaning: The nozzle through which water is sprayed in a shower.
meanings.example: They replaced the old shower head to improve water pressure.
meanings.translation: A saída pela qual a água é pulverizada em um chuveiro. Eles substituíram o antigo chuveiro para melhorar a pressão da água.

meanings.meaning: An appliance used for automatically washing dishes and utensils.
meanings.example: She loaded the dirty dishes into the dishwasher after dinner.
meanings.translation: Um eletrodoméstico usado para lavar automaticamente pratos e utensílios. Ela colocou os pratos sujos na máquina de lavar louça depois do jantar.

meanings.meaning: A small table placed beside a chair or sofa for holding items.
meanings.example: He kept his cup of tea on the side table while reading.
meanings.translation: Uma mesa pequena colocada ao lado de uma cadeira ou sofá para guardar itens. Ele deixou sua xícara de chá na mesa de apoio enquanto lia.

meanings.meaning: A clock equipped with an alarm to wake a person up at a set time.
meanings.example: She set the alarm clock to ensure she woke up early for the meeting.
meanings.translation: Um relógio equipado com um alarme para acordar uma pessoa em um horário definido. Ela ajustou o despertador para garantir que acordaria cedo para a reunião.

meanings.meaning: A device used for hanging clothes to keep them organized and wrinkle-free.
meanings.example: She hung her freshly ironed clothes on the clothes hanger.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo usado para pendurar roupas para mantê-las organizadas e sem amassar. Ela pendurou suas roupas recém-passadas no cabide.

meanings.meaning: The horizontal ledge at the bottom of a window frame.
meanings.example: She placed potted plants on the window sill to catch the sunlight.
meanings.translation: A plataforma horizontal na parte inferior de uma moldura de janela. Ela colocou plantas em vasos no peitoril da janela para capturar a luz solar.

meanings.meaning: A device used for measuring a person's weight.
meanings.example: He stepped on the bathroom scale to track his progress.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo usado para medir o peso de uma pessoa. Ele subiu na balança do banheiro para acompanhar seu progresso.

meanings.meaning: A collection of pots, pans, and other kitchen utensils used for cooking.
meanings.example: They received a new cookware set as a wedding gift.
meanings.translation: Uma coleção de panelas, frigideiras e outros utensílios de cozinha usados para cozinhar. Eles receberam um novo conjunto de panelas como presente de casamento.

meanings.meaning: An appliance used for heating or cooking food quickly using microwaves.
meanings.example: She warmed up leftovers in the microwave oven for a quick meal.
meanings.translation: Um eletrodoméstico usado para aquecer ou cozinhar alimentos rapidamente usando micro-ondas. Ela esquentou as sobras no forno de micro-ondas para uma refeição rápida.

meanings.meaning: A flat horizontal surface attached to a wall for holding objects.
meanings.example: They displayed family photos and souvenirs on the wall shelf.
meanings.translation: Uma superfície plana horizontal fixada na parede para guardar objetos. Eles exibiam fotos de família e lembranças na prateleira da parede.

meanings.meaning: A piece of furniture with drawers used for storing clothes.
meanings.example: She organized her socks and undergarments in the dresser drawers.
meanings.translation: Um móvel com gavetas usado para guardar roupas. Ela organizou suas meias e roupas íntimas nas gavetas da cômoda.

meanings.meaning: A tap or valve in the kitchen used for controlling the flow of water.
meanings.example: She turned on the kitchen faucet to fill a pot with water.
meanings.translation: Uma torneira ou válvula na cozinha usada para controlar o fluxo de água. Ela abriu a torneira da cozinha para encher uma panela com água.

meanings.meaning: A decorative container used for holding flowers or other arrangements.
meanings.example: They placed a bouquet of roses in the vase on the dining table.
meanings.translation: Um recipiente decorativo usado para guardar flores ou outros arranjos. Eles colocaram um buquê de rosas no vaso da mesa de jantar.

meanings.meaning: A cover for a lamp to diffuse or direct the light.
meanings.example: She replaced the old lampshade with a new one to change the room's ambiance.
meanings.translation: Uma capa para uma lâmpada para difundir ou direcionar a luz. Ela substituiu a antiga cúpula da lâmpada por uma nova para mudar a atmosfera do ambiente.

meanings.meaning: An enclosed area for babies or young children to play safely.
meanings.example: They set up a playpen in the living room for the toddler to play in.
meanings.translation: Uma área cercada para bebês ou crianças pequenas brincarem com segurança. Eles montaram um cercadinho na sala de estar para o bebê brincar.

meanings.meaning: A cleaning tool used for scrubbing and cleaning the inside of a toilet bowl.
meanings.example: She used the toilet brush to keep the toilet clean and hygienic.
meanings.translation: Uma ferramenta de limpeza usada para esfregar e limpar o interior da bacia do vaso sanitário. Ela usava a escova de vaso para manter o banheiro limpo e higiênico.

meanings.meaning: A handheld device used to control a television's functions remotely.
meanings.example: He searched for the television remote to change the channel.
meanings.translation: Um dispositivo portátil usado para controlar as funções de uma televisão remotamente. Ele procurou pelo controle remoto da televisão para trocar de canal.

meanings.meaning: A protective barrier or support along a staircase for safety.
meanings.example: She held onto the staircase railing while going down the stairs.
meanings.translation: Uma barreira protetora ou suporte ao longo de uma escada para segurança. Ela segurou-se no corrimão da escada ao descer.

meanings.meaning: A stand or support used for holding suitcases or bags.
meanings.example: They placed their suitcases on the luggage rack in the guest room.
meanings.translation: Um suporte usado para segurar malas ou bolsas. Eles colocaram as malas no suporte de bagagem no quarto de hóspedes.

meanings.meaning: The decorative border or structure around a mirror.
